# üëã Hi, I'm Winston Wang

I bridge theory and practice across the full machine learning lifecycle‚Äîfrom Python scripting to LLM finetuning.

üöÄ Data Scientist with 4+ years of experience in ML, NLP, and AutoML.  
üå± Creator of [GridMaster](https://github.com/wins-wang/GridMaster) ‚Äì An intuitive AutoML toolkit.  
‚úçÔ∏è I write technical tutorials and research summaries at [Medium](https://winston-wang.medium.com).  
üåê Visit my portfolio: [winston-wang.com](https://winston-wang.com)

üß† I build tools that simplify complexity, turning curiosity into clarity, and one data-driven solution at a time, I hope to make a meaningful contribution to the world.
